text:
@perlmutations @Layneiak Dear World:

It’s been 46 days since the POTUS has even mentioned Covid-19 to the American people.  It may look like he doesn’t have a plan, but he’s following Putin’s playbook.  Top priority decimate, destroy and distract.  Burn it all to the ground including the citizens!
